documentation.title: Opening Function Brace Bsd Allman
documentation.standard: Function declarations must follow the "BSD/Allman style". The opening brace is on the line following the function declaration and is indented to the same column as the start of the function declaration. The brace must be the last content on the line.

code.title: Valid: Opening brace on the next line.
Invalid: Opening brace on the same line.
